name: Akrysolv® 1050 XX-58
description: Akrysolv® 1050 XX-58 is a acrylic resin used for Air-drying products for Metal Protection and DIY Products. It is dedicated to the production of two-component polyurethane products and one-component acrylic enamels and paints. Compared to conventional alkyds, they feature better resistance and decorative properties. Their production is based on an optimized recipe, which allows us to obtain products with a high-performance quality, perfectly adapted to the needs and expectations.
